thread.section_title: Celebrity Style, Fashion, Beauty, and Red Carpet | PEOPLE
thread.title: Love Her Outfit: Star Style to Steal
thread.title_full: Love Her Outfit: Star Style to Steal

author: Alex Apatoff
title: Love Her Outfit: Star Style to Steal

organizations.name: photographer group / splash news online  jessica alba

text:
Splash News Online 
NINA DOBREV 
The actress offsets the super-flirty hemline of her geometric-print Armani mini with a moto jacket draped over her shoulders and demure, chunky-heeled L.K. Bennett pumps . 2 of 50 Photographer Group / Splash News Online 
FREIDA PINTO 
Showing how well black jeans transition from work to weekend, the star tops hers with an ivory blouse, textured blazer and a red lip for a look that works as well on as off the clock. 3 of 50 Pacific Coast News 
KATE HUDSON 
Show off (or fake!) an hourglass shape by tucking a breezy knit into some high-waist flares. Kate plays up the retro vibe of her look with platform heels, round sunglasses and a Jimmy Choo messenger bag , but you could give it a totally different vibe with a braid, backpack and pointy heels. 4 of 50 Ray Tamarra/GC Images 
SARAH PAULSON 
Need to make your trusty LBD pop? Do as Sarah does in her Co A-line dress : add high-shine metallic earrings (hers are Veronika Borchers x Pearl Collective ) and a chic print pump (like her Kurt Geiger London pair ). 5 of 50 Neil Warner / Splash News Online 
OLIVIA PALERMO 
When are leggings appropriate for air travel? When they're leather leggings (like Olivia's J Brand pair ). She wears hers with a slouchy turtleneck (cozy!) and sporty white jacket (brave, but we bet she's flying private!). 6 of 50 FameFlynet 
JESSICA BIEL 
Got $25? Then you can snag Jessica's perfect gray sweater from Forever 21 and wear it with, well, anything - though we love how she styled it with preppy classics including an Etienne Aigner tote and glossy black loafers. 7 of 50 
TERESA PALMER 
Navigating Sundance's "cozy but chic" dress code can be tricky. Teresa pulls it off effortlessly by layering a button-up between two supersoft knit pieces, then adding opaque Josie Natori tights and flat booties. 8 of 50 Bauer-Griffin/GC Images 
LUCY HALE 
The Pretty Little Liars star makes jeans and a tee way more than just jeans and a tee thanks to her chic accessories, including a blush bomber, black boots and trendy Smoke x Mirrors sunglasses . 9 of 50 Jackson Lee/Splash News Online 
GABRIELLE UNION 
Gabrielle is here to convince you that sandals are appropriate 365 days a year, especially if they are as cute as her "Liloka" Schutz style , which she pairs with cropped white trousers, a navy Vince turtleneck , matching coat and Haze sunglasses. 10 of 50 Splash News Online 
KOURTNEY KARDASHIAN 
The more rips the better appears to be the KarJenner denim philosophy, as Kourtney proves true in her overly distressed jeans teamed with a velvet blazer (sans shirt underneath), coordinating velvet booties and a Louis Vuitton backpack, for a '90s fashion fantasy come to life. 11 of 50 Starzfly/Bauer-Griffin/GC Images 
CHRISSY TEIGEN 
While some travel in their yoga pants and running sneakers, Chrissy travels in her striped draped ATM Collection sweater (on sale now!) , black skinnies, her chicest ankle boots, a Chanel bag and cool-girl fedora. 12 of 50 AKM-GSI 
ABIGAIL SPENCER 
Running errands looks effortlessly more chic when you're wearing a pair of leather pants, white Adidas sneakers, a striped La Ligne NYC shir t and the perfect bomber courtesy The Arrivals . But who are we kidding: Abigail's best accessory is her pup. 13 of 50 Splash News Online 
OLIVIA PALERMO 
The star breaks a few style "rules" - wearing white in the winter, mixing opposites on the color wheel with her olive military overcoat and maroon Longchamp bag - and shows just how chic breaking the rules can look. 14 of 50 BG001/Bauer-Griffin/GC Images 
KENDALL JENNER 
Last year's cropped "Mom Jeans" work well into winter with a super-slouchy sweater, a crossbody and ankle booties, as the star (wearing Krewe sunglasses ) shows. 15 of 50 Ryan Turgeon/ Splash News Online 
KATIE HOLMES 
Camo looks super fresh in an unexpected silhouette like her bell-shaped coat, and her straight-leg jeans and gold-buckled loafers keep the whole look grounded and cool. 16 of 50 AKM-GSI 
CHRISTINA RICCI 
The accents on her heels echo the buttons her Antonio Berardi dress, and the tweed coat and pearls pull it all together for a very classic feel. 17 of 50 Stefanie Keenan/Getty 
NICOLE RICHIE 
If you're intrigued by the red carpet sweatshirt trend , here's an easy entry point: pair your super-sparkly number with ripped jeans and loafers (that have a little surprise shine on the heel) and add some flirty earrings to keep the whole look elevated. 18 of 50 Splash News Online 
LEA MICHELE 
The moto-style zip on her Fay coat echoes the studded detailing on her booties - and contrasts with the super-cozy Aerie sweater and comfy American Eagle jeggings underneath. 19 of 50 Vince Flores/Startraks 
JAMIE CHUNG 
Classic basics are the best things to pair with a statement shoe like Jamie's gold Aska booties - a leather skirt and menswear-inspired blazer are just the right mix of easy and edgy. 20 of 50 MelMedia/GC Images 
FELICITY JONES 
Though her coat (with its velvet details and brass buttons) is super-formal, wearing it with jeans, booties and a lipstick-red purse makes it look more quirky and girlie. 21 of 50 
CHANEL IMAN 
Pro model tip: If you really want to get the most out of your oxblood fur-lined parka ( hers is Moose Knuckles ), wear it with a pair of booties in the same deep red shade. 22 of 50 Beretta/Sims/REX/Shutterstock 
NICOLE KIDMAN 
Want a holiday look that's dressy but still warm? Super dark-wash, slightly flared denim ( hers are Mother ), a black turtleneck and a strappy pare of pumps fits that bill. 23 of 50 Kevin Winter/Getty 
EMMA STONE 
If you're still in a climate that will tolerate bare legs, you might as well make the most of it by picking sunny, citrus-y brights that play off each other (like her Giambattista Valli mini and tomato-red Tyler Ellis x Petra Flannery clutch). 24 of 50 SMXRF/Star Max/GC Images 
KATE BECKINSALE 
Leather pants ( Kate's are J Brand ) don't always to be edgy! When paired with a silky jacket and scarf-neck blouse, they're downright ladylike. 25 of 50 Billy Farrell/BFA/REX/Shutterstock 
GWYNETH PALTROW 
And regular leggings don't have to be relegated to the "not pants" pile - Gwyneth's $17.99 pair from H&M look totally chic when tucked into luxe knee-high boots and worn under a coat with rich, tactile cuffs. 26 of 50 MEGA 
SOFIA VERGARA 
Jeans, a tee and a comfy cardigan ( hers is Karen Kane ) look great with pretty much any accessories under the sun - we like the mix of textures in her tan quilted bag and suede booties. 27 of 50 Bauer-Griffin 
EMMY ROSSUM 
A striped shirt is a timeless basic, but a striped turtleneck is the basic you need right now. 28 of 50 KCS Presse / Splash News Online 
ALESSANDRA AMBROSIO 
A black turtleneck can be worn a million different ways, but we love the French girl-chic variation rocked by Alessandra here - the sheer maxi, chain-studded moto and geometric earrings make for one instant classic outfit. 29 of 50 AKM-GSI 
EMMA ROBERTS 
This is how we always think we look when we walk out of the house all bundled up. The star is cute and cozy from her head (clad in a Max Mara beanie ) to her shoulders (in an Inhabit scarf, J Brand crop top , Express jacket and Elisabeth Weinstock purse ) to her knees and toes (wearing Dear Frances boots ). 30 of 50 Daniel Zuchnik/GC Images 
VICTORIA JUSTICE 
A hot pink soft wool trench like her Ted Baker style makes any outfit pop - but we like that she gave hers some "Grease" vibes with leather pants, sassy Sam Edelman heels and cat-eye Jonathan Adler shades . 31 of 50 FameFlynet 
MANDY MOORE 
A striped tee and cigarette pants is the perfect base for tons of outfits. From there, you can add quirky accessories, like Mandy's backless red loafers, cheery tiered jacket and Perverse sunglasses . 32 of 50 Alessio Botticelli/FilmMagic 
MINDY KALING 
Mindy may be filming Ocean's Eight, but she is also giving you your work outfit inspiration for the week. We love the way the cherry red of her blouse and belt coordinates with her coat, and the black pumps are all business but would work equally well for after-work drinks. 33 of 50 
KATE BOSWORTH 
A super-girlie Swiss dotted sheer dress ( hers is just $58 from the Kohl's k/lab collection !) gets a little kick from some bold accessories, including her patent booties, chunky belt and Salvatore Ferragamo bucket bag . 34 of 50 Felipe Ramales / Splash News Online 
NAOMIE HARRIS 
A way to winterize your favorite summer pieces that isn't simply "add black tights?" Try jewel-tone embellished flats and a luxe coat like her Burberry cashmere trench . 35 of 50 Olivier Douliery/ABACA/AP 
MICHELLE OBAMA 
You don't always have to default to green or sequins for your holiday party attire! Rich, deep cobalt and pretty brocade prints look just as festive (and silver shoes add a party feel to any outfit). Plus, when all else fails: put a bow on it. 36 of 50 
ALESSANDRA AMBROSIO 
One easy way to spice up your favorite jeans-and-sweater airport ensemble: watch our handy GIFs to teach you how to tie a scarf in a new, fun way. 37 of 50 Photographer Group / Splash News Online 
JESSICA ALBA 
A long-sleeved print mini is adorable with flats in warmer months, and can be just as flirty in cooler months -- the added coverage of the tights means you can get a little fiercer with the footwear without looking too over-the-top. 38 of 50 Bryan Kasm/HSN 
MELISSA MCCARTHY 
A jewel tone top with an embellished collar ( hers is from her own line, Melissa McCarthy Seven7 ), plus black pants and classic black heels, is the perfect work holiday party outfit that will still be cute long into 2017. 39 of 50 Todd Williamson/Getty 
EMMA STONE 
Does a print suit sound daunting? Just check out how easy it looks on Emma (hers is Burberry) with a black tank, ankle tie Stella Luna heels and super-minimal jewelry. 40 of 50 Splash News Online 
PIPPA MIDDLETON 
Contrast the patrician vibe of a brushed-wool dove gray coat with classic hardware with some slightly edgy buckled boots. 41 of 50 FameFlynet 
KATE BECKINSALE 
If you can solve the problem of how to walk without shrugging your scarf off, a large-check number worn as a poncho looks extra-classy over an all-black outfit, cat-eye sunglasses and heels. 42 of 50 starzfly/Bauer-Griffin/GC Images 
LILY COLLINS 
Got a lot of holiday travel planned? Eliminate one source of stress with this plane-perfect outfit (from her Parker Smith skinnies to her easy-to-slip-off-at-security booties). 43 of 50 Billy Farrell/BFA/REX/Shutterstock 
EMMY ROSSUM 
Brown stretch suede pants are a little advanced, but the good news is, this outfit (including the aforementioned pants, blazer , sweater , boots and clutch, with Lace by Jenny Wu earrings ) would look equally adorable with your favorite dark skinny jeans. 44 of 50 AKM-GSI 
REESE WITHERSPOON 
This is the Platonic ideal of a Thanksgiving outfit: a classic Fair Isle sweater (hers is Draper James , of course), some jeans with a little give and a festive accessory like a red shoe or bag. It can vibe dressy or casual - so it's perfect for the first Thanksgiving at the potential future in-laws'. (Bonus points for a cute coordinate phone case, like her Minnie & Emma one !) 45 of 50 AKM-GSI 
MICHELLE MONAGHAN 
A soft, semi-structured sweater coat like Michelle's Madewell topper will double as a blanket when that turkey-induced couch coma kicks in (and the rest of the outfit, including her Madewell jeans , is comfy but still cool). 46 of 50 Michael Simon/startraks 
OLIVIA CULPO 
What's both fashion forward and mashed potatoes-friendly? An oversize sweater and over-the-knee boots ( hers are Rampage ). 47 of 50 Bauer-Griffin 
HILARY DUFF 
A cozy crewneck looks modern and unexpected when tucked into a maxi skirt (note the stretch) and paired with statement earrings like her The2Bandits pair . She wore hers with Ancient Greek sandals , but in colder climates, this would be cute with suede booties as well. 48 of 50 Michael Rozman / Warner Bros. 
EMMA STONE 
If your Thanksgiving dinner is a little dressier, go for a jumpsuit - it's basically fancy pajamas, but no one will know. (Emma wore her Michael Kors Collection top and Michael Michael Kors pants with Jennifer Meyer jewelry and Jimmy Choo heels .) 49 of 50 AKM-GSI 
EMMA ROBERTS 
Don't want to talk about the election, your dating life or why you're taking seconds? The dinosaur on your sweatshirt will be an awesome conversation piece! (Emma let hers take center stage by pairing it with Citizens of Humanity jeans , sneakers and Garrett Leight x Clare V sunglasses.) 50 of 50 NIGNY / Splash News Online 
BELLA HADID 
When all else fails, including the button on your jeans, just wear all black and throw on a bold coat (hers is House of Harlow 1960 x Revolve ) and fabulous shoe ( hers are Stuart Weitzman ). It's a foolproof trick that's served stylish women since the beginning of time. See Also
